alert.note: Alert for Benton; Carver; Isanti; Kanabec; McLeod; Mille Lacs; Morrison; Rice; Scott; Sherburne; Wright (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Advisory issued January 26 at 9:55AM CST until January 26 at 11:00AM CST by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...BLOWING AND DRIFTING SNOW ACROSS WESTERN MINNESOTA... .Wind gusts up to 45 mph will lead to areas of blowing and drifting snow across western Minnesota through this afternoon. Widespread visibility down to 1 mile is expected across open areas, with brief whiteout conditions possible. ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 40 degrees below zero. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 30 to 35 degrees below zero. * WHERE...Morrison and Benton Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, until 9 AM CST Wednesday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, from 9 AM to 11 AM CST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
